title: Looking For TWICE Club Tag (NA)
body:
Hello all! I'm currently looking for the club with the tag that owns TWICE (for NA), and would love to know if anyone here knows anyone who currently has ownership. I've been searching for a few days now, but no luck has struck me just yet. Greatly appreciated to anyone who takes the time to read this or try to help, and if by chance the owner sees this:

My summoner name on league is : i love sana

replies.body:
You know that portion of Craigslist where people try and reach out to random strangers they've seen because they have no other way to contact them?

This is kinda like that. And just as unlikely to yield results.
